channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Kim's Convenience
channel.desc: Appa inherits a smartphone; Umma discovers a pest in the store; Kimchee tries to help Janet with her F.O.M.O.; Jung tries to reconnect with a girl.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: Crabtree investigates the death of a wrestler and uncovers deception and fraud.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Downton Abbey
channel.desc: Change is in the air when an exciting opportunity for Alfred creates tension between Ivy and Daisy, Isobel appeals to Violet's charitable nature, but it does not come without a struggle, and Branson considers a new future for himself and baby Sybbie.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
channel.desc: Hot smoked salmon pasta and spiced whole roast cauliflower with Middle Eastern flavors.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
channel.desc: Jamie Oliver provides the ultimate set of go-to recipes for quick and easy-to-remember cooking. These stress-free recipes are perfect for busy days and for people who love their grub, but don't have the time or energy for complicated cooking.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: CBC Toronto News
channel.desc: Dwight Drummond and the CBC Toronto News team take a comprehensive look at the day's top stories, with breaking news, live reports and updates relevant to the city of Toronto.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Ollie and Dee-Dee join Adam and Alya for lunch, Debbie finds Abi in Carl's hotel room.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Family Feud Canada
channel.desc: Two families compete to guess the most popular answers to family-friendly survey questions, with a Canadian twist.
